name: @cumulus/files-to-granules
description: Converts array-of-files input into a granules object by extracting granuleId from filename

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R schemas dist/ && webpack
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R schemas dist/ && webpack --progress -w
scripts.package: npm run build && (cd dist && zip -q -r lambda.zip index.js schemas)

author: Cumulus Authors
